item.title: Cybersploit 2 CTF walkthrough
item.description: Cybersploit 2 is a fun boot2root on VulnHub. It’s quite an enjoyable box, and whilst user is really rather easy, getting root is quite an interesting affair (at least I found it to be). Initial foothold Let’s scan the box and see what ports are open with nmap -sC -sV -p- 192.168.123.131: Starting Nmap 7.80 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2020-07-24 19:54 BST Nmap scan report for 192.168.123.131 Host is up (0.
